divs: sighting detailson 12\12\11 at 7:30 am i was driving north on waverly road in lansing. i looked over at the moon which was still fully visible in the western sky. it looked like there was a craft hanging under the moon. i did believe it to be an airplane, but what was strange was that the craft was fully lit up. airplanes aren't typically lit in entirety. as i continued to watch it, it began moving and was, perception wise, at a level that was higher than the moon. i noticed a flashing light, but again the entire craft was very bright and i was having getting a good look at it and was also was driving. i continued to watch for it, but i lost visibility of it. there was no contrail, and it was much lower than a jet would have been traveling. when i arrived home, i got out of my car and noticed a jet in the sky that was traveling south and it clearly had a contrail. the jet was much higher than the object i saw and being a jet, it was barely visible in front of the contrail.
